UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a single research or publishing project.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this project.

topic.description: The specific topic of the project.

courseLevel.description: The academic level of the course.

synopsisFileUrl.description: URL to the uploaded synopsis file.

referencingStyle.description: The required referencing style (e.g., APA, MLA).

wantToPublish.description: Indicates if the client wants to publish the work.

publishWhere.description: Specifies where the client wants to publish.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for all users.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Top-level collection for all research projects, owned by users.
